import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import tennisracketdtsstencil from '../images/tennisracketdtsstencil.png' import tennisracketnodtsstencil from '../images/tennisracketnodtsstencil.png' const MakeAppointment = (props) => { const [displayBoolean, setDisplayBoolean] = useState(false) useEffect (() => { const stencilCheckbox = document.getElementById('stencilCheckbox') const appointmentRacketBase = document.getElementById('appointmentRacketStencil') const appointmentRacketStencil = document.getElementById('appointmentRacketStencil') if (displayBoolean === true) { appointmentRacketBase.style.display = 'flex' appointmentRacketStencil.style.display = 'none' } else { appointmentRacketBase.style.display = 'none' appointmentRacketStencil.style.display = 'flex' } }) //Creates minDate for Drop-off let minDate = new Date() let day = minDate.getDate() let month = minDate.getMonth() + 1 let year = minDate.getFullYear() if (day < 10) { day = '0' + day } if (month < 10) { month = '0' + month } minDate = year + '-' + month + '-' + day return (

Order Form



Tension



String Type

Scheduling



Optionals setDisplayBoolean(true)}>

) } export default MakeAppointment
